remarks:
Distribute a restricted universal quantifier over a biconditional. Restricted quantification version of ~ albi .  (Contributed by NM, 6-Oct-2003.) 

---

 Distribute a restricted universal quantifier over a biconditional. Theorem 19.15 of [Margaris] p. 90 with restricted quantification. (Contributed by NM, 6-Oct-2003.)
statement: ralbi $p |- ( A. x e. A ( ph <-> ps ) -> ( A. x e. A ph <-> A. x e. A ps ) ) $.
